A

askToKeepHand() - Static method in class Hand
Prompts user to enter which die to keep and load them into the keep arrayList
askToPlayAgain() - Static method in class YahtzeeTester
Prompts the user to play again when either the number of current rounds reaches the maximum amount, or when the user wants to keep all of their dice.

C

changeConfig() - Static method in class ConfigFile
gets the new config settings and calls to write them to the input file
checkContainsN() - Static method in class Hand
checks if keepStr contains the letter n
configArr - Static variable in class ConfigFile
 
ConfigFile - Class in <Unnamed>
 
ConfigFile() - Constructor for class ConfigFile
 
curTurn - Static variable in class YahtzeeTester
 

D

Dice - Class in <Unnamed>
 
dieArr - Static variable in class Hand
 
displayHand() - Static method in class Hand
Displays the hand array which contains the die values

F

findFullHouse() - Static method in class Score
Finds if there is a full house in the final hand.
findMaxOfAKind() - Static method in class Score
Searches the final hand for the highest recurrence of a number
findMaxStraight() - Static method in class Score
Iterates through final hand and looks for the longest straight
findYahtzee() - Static method in class Score
iterates through final hand and looks for a yahtzee

H

Hand - Class in <Unnamed>
 

K

keepStr - Static variable in class Hand
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class YahtzeeTester
Yahtzee Tester drives the Yahtzee program by making use of classes Dice, Hand, Score, and ConfigFile
maxTurns - Static variable in class YahtzeeTester
 

N

numDie - Static variable in class Hand
 
numSides - Static variable in class Dice
 

P

popNewHand() - Method in class Hand
Rolls a new hand if the keep array in same index is 'n' and then stores the new value in indexed position of array list.
promptConfigChange() - Static method in class YahtzeeTester
displays the current settings of the game from the configFile and asks the user if they want to change the settings.

R

readFromFile() - Static method in class ConfigFile
Reads from an input file and assigns values to configArr which holds the values to be updated later on
readYahtzeeConfig() - Static method in class YahtzeeTester
This program prompts the config fig to be read and updates values of Dice.numSides, Hand.numDie and maxTurns
rollDie() - Static method in class Dice
 

S

Score - Class in <Unnamed>
This program controls the scoring for the game once the final hand is reached.
Score() - Constructor for class Score
 
sortHand() - Static method in class Hand
This program sorts the die hand, and thus the keep array accordingly.

T

totalAllDice() - Static method in class Score
Totals the value of the final hand of die
totalOfEachNumScore() - Static method in class Score
Totals the quantity of each number of the die and outputs the score

W

writeToFile() - Static method in class ConfigFile
Writes to the file if the user wants to change the game settings

Y

YahtzeeTester - Class in <Unnamed>
